Blacknightmare:

The femme walked slowly following Perseus



  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: Kraftlos 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: =
Wednesday, November 28, 2007 10:37 PM
  Subject: Re: Atlantis - Picking Up =
The Pieces


  Perseus motioned to the trooper that had followed him down t=
here and the trooper came over to the cell and unlocked the door.

  "Let's=
 go to somewhere more comfortable," he said to Blacknightmare, motioning fo=
r her to follow him. 



  On Nov 25, 2007 7:08 PM, Airshadow <airly2002@ho=
tmail.com> wrote:


    Blacknightmare:

    "Then we should start" said th=
e femme


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Kraftlos 
      T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, November 25, 2007 4:56 PM
  =
    Subject: Atlantis - Picking Up The Pieces


      Lord Perseus helped t=
he militia put out the last of the fires while Ravenchief flew above the ci=
ty taking pictures of the damage.  No one could keep their mind of the batt=
le which was going on just a few short miles away.

      Ravenchief glance=
d in the direction of the battle, but all he could see was the faint cloud =
of sweeps which surrounded the island.  They felt horrible that Rodimus and=
 the Matrix were at stake, and there was nothing they could do. 

      "Pe=
rseus to all Maximals in Atlantis, I need to tend to our guest.  Please mak=
e yourselves useful to the work crews, its going to be a long recovery." he=
 said in a distant-sounding tone.

      Perseus approached the shield and =
glanced around the area for any enemies.  Salveo waited for the signal, the=
n dropped the shield.  The doors opened and Perseus stepped inside; Guardia=
 took this opportunity to go out before the shield came back up.  A moment =
later the defenses were back in place. 

      Perseus walked down the narr=
ow corridor ramps, leading the the lowest level of the base.  At the holdin=
g cells, he pushed a button on the panel next to battered blast doors and i=
t slid open, revealing the completely trashed holding cell and security off=
ice.  He continued to the dimly lit secondary cell and knocked on the bars.=
 

      "Blacknightmare?  I apologize for making you wait so long.  We hav=
e some things we need to discuss." he said calmly.

      [TAG: Blacknightm=
are, Maximals in Atlantis]
